name: FIND X (Josh Delson)
description:
Can you find X?

Travel through a mysterious school of calculators who suck at math. Help them out with your handy dandy label maker to solve their randomly generated math riddles ranging from 1st grade to ACT/SAT questions. (Created for Unexpected Jam 2020)

Credit: Josh Delson, David Wales, Andy Bagdady, &  Melvin McElrith
